mapper.select: SELECT member_name, member_type FROM member WHERE social_id = #{social_id}

SELECT resv_id, resv_num, (select event_name from event_list where event_id = reservation.event_id) as event_name, resv_date, resv_people FROM reservation WHERE member_id = (select member_id from member where social_id = #{social_id}) ORDER BY resv_id desc
SELECT qna_id ,qna_title, qna_content, qna_date, qna_result FROM qna WHERE member_id =(select member_id from member where social_id = #{social_id}) ORDER BY qna_id desc
